title: The Breakfast Club Talks With Tonya Lewis, Lee, Bun B, VMA Noms and Homophobic Lawmakers
itunes:title: The Breakfast Club Talks With Tonya Lewis, Lee, Bun B, VMA Noms and Homophobic Lawmakers
description:
Today on The Breakfast Club we have film maker Tonya Lewis Lee join us! During Rumor Report, Angela dishes the 2022 VMA Nominations while she takes advice from listeners later during Ask Yee. Charlamagne gives his Donkey to a GOP Lawmaker who simply played himself. 

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
